wireframe

Class Header

  • java.lang.Object
    • wireframe.AbstractElement
      • wireframe.AbstractWireframeElement
        • wireframe.Header
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Groupable

    public class Header
extends AbstractWireframeElement
    A Header element represents some blocked-out text that is larger than regular text, meant as a headline. The blocked-out text can be aligned.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Header(Location location)
      Creates a Header element with default alignment LEFT at specified location.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Enums.Alignment getAlignment()
      Returns the alignment of this Header's text.
      (package private) void setAlignment(Enums.Alignment alignment)
      Aligns this Header's text.
